scripts.generate-ts-api: npm run build && ./dist/generateCode/esc/bin/generateCode.js ./src/pub/esc/typescriptAST && npm run build
scripts.pubMin: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version minor && npm run copyPackage && cd ./dist/pub && git push && npm publish
scripts.pubPatch: npm run validatePublishReadiness && npm version patch && npm run copyPackage && cd ./dist/pub && git push && npm publish
scripts.validatePublishReadiness: git diff --exit-code && ncu -u --packageFile package.json && npm install && npm run build
